title: Interpretation of a dream about crying with a sick person by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about crying with a sick person Today, and through the website, we will talk about the interpretation of the dream that you are crying with a sick person. Some scholars have interpreted it to mean that if the dreamer sees himself crying loudly, it is an unpleasant vision because it portends evil, but if he sees himself crying without a sound, this indicates kindness and comfort, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about crying with a sick girl. Senior scholars have interpreted the vision of an unmarried girl crying in front of a sick person, and this is an indication of the worries and problems that she will face. From the great servant, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about crying with a child. Scientists have interpreted the dreamer’s vision of crying with a child as indicating the presence of an evil person in his life who will harm him and destroy his life. However, if this child is ugly, it is an indication of the problems and worries that come upon the child. Dreamer...but if this child is beautiful and cries without screaming, this indicates her marriage to a pious man who will be happy in her life, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about crying with a sick person for a married person. Senior scholars have interpreted seeing a husband crying in a dream, and it is evidence of the removal of worries and problems. And gaining livelihood and great wealth if you cry without making a loud sound. And divorce, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream that you are crying and hugging someone you love. Scientists interpreted the dream of a person hugging you while you are crying as evidence of reassurance, comfort, and calm. Crying generally indicates comfort, relief from problems, and fulfillment of desires. But if the dreamer is going through difficult circumstances, this indicates that getting rid of these difficulties, and that God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about crying with someone you love. Scientists interpreted a dream about crying with someone you love as a sign of great love between them, the strength of the relationship, and great understanding, but if a woman sees If a married woman cries with her husband, this is evidence of envy. That you are exposed to, and it is also an indication of the troubles and worries that he is exposed to in the marital relationship, but they will end soon. God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about crying with someone you know. Scientists interpreted seeing you crying with someone you know as indicating great goodness for this person, but goodness will not come until after Exhaustion and great effort, it also indicates joy and marriage to one person. Soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about crying with someone you love who is sad. Scientists have interpreted seeing someone you love sad and crying as a sign of the great good that awaits him and freedom from worries and problems. Also, this person needs your help, but he is ashamed to ask you for help, but if the girl sees him sad in her dream, this is a sign of some differences that she will face in her life, and God Almighty knows that. Interpretation of a dream about crying with a sick person by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about crying and screaming with a sick person. However, it is a sign that this person is far from God Almighty and will be exposed to a major accident that will change the course of his life and bring him back to his senses and become closer to Him. To Almighty God, but if he sees himself being slapped in the face, it means that he will. He is exposed to an accident that disfigures his face, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about crying with a sick person by Ibn Shaheen. The scholar Ibn Shaheen interpreted a dream about crying as

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a woman leading a woman to pray in full in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing an imam in a dream. Visions often came in some people's dreams, so we presented to you, our beloved followers, all the special facts about a woman leading men in prayer in a complete dream, as well as what is the interpretation of seeing a woman praying. Besides men, through the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of the imam of the woman who saw Ibn Shirin? The interpretation of seeing the imam in general in a dream is full of desirable visions that indicate a high status and the acquisition of prestigious positions. Also, seeing the entire imam of a woman in a dream It means that she has responsibility and the ability to control family affairs. Seeing a person who has become an imam for the people in a complete dream is a good omen and a sign that he will gain power and status in society. But seeing a woman fraternizing with men in a complete dream is one of the unwanted dreams that may It carries meanings of doom and death. Also, seeing the dead imam completely in a dream indicates great corruption in religion and morals and the entry of an unstable period. What is the interpretation of the imam seeing the women’s bowl? Seeing the same girl praying in a complete dream means that her prayers will be answered, and she will receive many blessings. Wishes and useful things. Also, dreaming of a full prayer in the mosque indicates that poor women have abundant wealth and that they will have a lot of money. The imam’s interpretation of a pious girl who sees a woman in a dream is full of good visions for her, which indicates her high status among people. Supplication For a public man in a dream is complete evidence that you do not listen to the other opinion and that you are making some mistakes. What is the interpretation of seeing an imam for a married woman? Seeing a woman completing her prayer in a dream is considered a good thing for her and her happiness and a sign that she will wish for a lot and achieve what she wants. Also, seeing a woman Driving a woman in a dream is a complete indication of her good condition, the expansion of her mind, and her wise ability to make things right. Seeing the same woman praying with men in a complete dream means that she is on the wrong path and entering a period full of anxiety. What is the interpretation of an imam for a pregnant woman? Interpretation of the vision of praying Kamel in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of goodness and security and that she will give birth to a child she desires and will be happy after giving birth. Seeing a pregnant woman in front of a woman in a Kamel dream indicates her strong ability to overcome her problems and a good role model among people. What is the interpretation of a woman praying next to a man? Seeing the same woman She prays next to her husband in a dream, full of good news and guidance in matters, and occupies the highest positions in her life. Also, seeing AA praying next to an unknown person in a perfect dream indicates that her marriage to a righteous man is approaching. If a man sees a woman who does not know how to pray next to him in a perfect dream, this means That he will achieve some of the goals he seeks. A man’s woman is complete in prayer in a dream. A man seeing a woman after a man’s prayer in a complete dream indicates a shaky personality and that he is going through some wrong experiences. Also, seeing a woman standing in front of men in a complete dream indicates the presence of a woman.

title: What is the most accurate interpretation of dreaming of a refrigerator in a dream?  What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator in a dream? Seeing a refrigerator is one of the visions that carry different connotations in the dreamer's dream, due to different considerations, such as whether the refrigerator is open or closed, intact or broken, and whether it is used for storage or decoration, and the refrigerator is an electrical device that no house is without because of its importance in storing food and preserving it from spoilage because it produces great coldness to the degree determined by the fortune teller, and perhaps seeing it in a dream is one of the visions that lead to more than one clue, so what does it symbolize? Interpretation of a dream about a refrigerator in a dream Some see that the refrigerator symbolizes the personal nature of the dreamer's personality in reality, as the refrigerator symbolizes a person who is characterized by coldness of nerves and patience, which may lead to challenging the opponent and spiritual maturity that is misinterpreted. It also refers to the goals that the person plans, the plans that are placed before the eye that must be followed, and the situations that the viewer is exposed to on a daily basis that require him to be more rational and responsive. There is an opinion that the refrigerator refers to the man and not the woman, because the process of cooking, storing and supervising food is the woman's work, while the source of this food that fills this refrigerator is the man in the first place, so the refrigerator It symbolizes the man because he is able to make the refrigerator full or empty. Based on the size of the refrigerator, the physical and social status of the person, if it is large and full of food, it indicates the wealth and status that this person occupies among his people and his great generosity. Existential sufficiency. If the refrigerator is small in size, this is a sign of a person who is still at the beginning of the road and who wants to reach a higher position than the one he is in, advancing gradually and at a steady pace. It is also said that the number of refrigerator doors is the same as the number of his wives in reality. If the refrigerator has one door, this means that he will marry a woman and will not marry her again, but if it has two doors, this indicates that he will marry another soon. Seeing snow in it also symbolizes the benefits, blessings and goodness that will come to the monarch and improve his condition. The vision indicates protection, love and the desire to live next to people to feel familiarity. Some commentators believe that seeing a refrigerator or any household appliance, such as a washing machine or furniture, is one of the visions that refer to a woman or a housewife, considering her the manager of family affairs, and wise in her choices and circumstances. The manager as well as the saver of the current stock. Seeing a refrigerator in a dream Miller's interpretation of seeing a refrigerator in a dream According to Miller's Encyclopedia, the refrigerator symbolizes a certain type of person who is the character who wants to own everything and benefit from everything that happens to him only. Miller goes on to say that the visionary may hurt some of those close to him unintentionally and without realizing what is happening, as the refrigerator symbolizes the intense anger that comes after long periods of calm and silence. Perhaps seeing the refrigerator in a dream is one of the visions that suggest greatness, goodness, and abundance of sustenance and arouses in the dreamer's mind a sense of security and future immunity

Miller goes on to say that the insight may hurt some close people Unintentionally and without them realizing what is happening, the refrigerator symbolizes intense anger that comes after long periods of calm and silence. Perhaps seeing a refrigerator in a dream is one of the visions that suggest greatness, goodness, and abundance of sustenance and arouse in the dreamer’s mind a sense of security and invulnerability for the future.

title: Interpretation of seeing a spear in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a spear in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. As for the pioneer and his sense of psychological calm and stability, or it refers to a concept that carries his evil and evil, we will talk about all of this through our topic: unmarried, married, pregnant, man, young man, and young man. Divorced. What is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a spear in a dream? Seeing a single girl with a spear in a dream indicates that she will enjoy a great source of livelihood and a sense of peace and psychological security, or that she will be exposed to great risks and difficulties in her life. Seeing a woman alone for a spear in a dream indicates her personality. Her strength and wisdom among people and her ability to solve their problems without the help of others. Seeing a girl with a spear and many swords symbolizes the generosity of her morals, the peace of her heart, and her good intentions. Seeing a spear in a dream is one of the promising visions that indicates that the dreamer will acquire enormous wealth and change the course of his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Ibrahim in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a spear in a dream? A married woman seeing a spear in a dream is one of the bad dreams that indicate that she will get into major problems with her husband’s family, as this may lead to divorce. Seeing a married woman carrying a spear in a dream is a symbol of stability and tranquility. And a feeling of calm. Seeing a married woman buying a spear in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness, joy and livelihood for her and her husband and the presence of love and faith between them. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a spear in a dream? A man seeing a spear in a dream indicates his strength and control over others and his possession of a strong personality. Seeing a married man buying a spear in a dream A spear and swords in a dream. It indicates his tyranny and hatred for everyone around him because of the oppression he exercises over others. Seeing a married man carrying a gun in a dream means his high status and position in the state with his obscene reputation. Seeing a man working in the arms trade means unfair ownership of people’s money and injustice to the poor and needy. See Also: Interpretation of seeing President Gamal Abdel Nasser in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a spear in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman with a spear in a dream is one of the bad dreams that indicate a constant feeling of sadness, mood swings, and anxiety about the future. Seeing a pregnant woman carrying a spear and many swords symbolizes that she will face Major problems and risks during pregnancy and that she will face problems in childbirth. Seeing a gun in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she can easily overcome the risks of childbirth while enjoying the best health for herself and her fetus. Seeing a spear in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the extent of her love and devotion to her husband and their continued cooperation to secure their future. See Also: Interpretation of seeing shrimp in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees a spear in a dream? Seeing a young man carrying a gun among many people shows that he got a great job and always outperformed his friends at work. A young man sees a spear in a dream and how others look at him with malice and hatred. It shows the large number of haters and enemies. In his life and their desire to destroy his life and harm him. Seeing a young man shooting

title: Interpretation of seeing paper money and coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin and collecting paper in a dream, and seeing the vision of taking paper and coins in a dream and finding paper and coins in a dream

preview.html: Seeing papers and coins in a dream: This vision indicates food and goodness, and is considered one of the good visions. It also carries many other interpretations according to opinion, and this we will learn through our website, so follow this article. Seeing papers and coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing papers and coins in a dream is this dream. It indicates goodness and living, and seeing money is a beautiful dream, as it indicates a blessing, and the vision also indicates the fulfillment of the desires and goals that the dreamer has planned. Finding a large number of coins in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness, and when a person sees that he has obtained a group of money Whether it is paper or metal, this is evidence of problems and fears, and problems are the same as the amount of money. Money is found to solve them easily, but if there is a lot, the problems and concerns are great and difficult to solve. Seeing someone giving someone a sum of money, whether it is paper or metal, indicates problems that arise between the dreamer and this person. Counting money in The dream is evidence that the dreamer is paying a large sum of money for an unpopular matter, as if he is paying this sum as compensation to others for the loss of a certain thing. Seeing paper and coins in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the vision indicates special worries and problems if found on the road, and it also indicates A lot of disagreements and fights, and it also indicates the difficulties that she will face, whether at work or in her life with her family. Seeing coins is a sign of problems and obstacles that she will suffer from, and seeing papers and coins in a dream indicates distress that will be followed by joy and happiness. Getting rid of papers Cash and coins are evidence of getting rid of worries and anxiety, and the arrival of comfort and pleasure, as well as giving money to an unknown person with the same meaning. Whoever sees himself in a dream carrying a sum of money, it is an indication of that person’s wealth, because it indicates wealth and living in happiness and tranquility. If he sees One sees an amount of money, whether it is paper or metal, this indicates livelihood. Seeing papers and coins in a single woman’s dream. Seeing unmarried women taking money, especially metal, is evidence that they will get what they want, in addition to that the vision is evidence On the fulfillment of desires and the appearance of good things in the coming period. The vision indicates earning a lot of money, whether it is from a business or a project that has been started. Counterfeit money in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the hypocrisy of people around the girl who speaks badly about her. Vision Papers and coins in a dream for a married woman. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing money in a dream for a married woman is evidence of some disputes in her marital life and shows the ongoing disagreement between her and her husband. However, if the husband gives her some money, this indicates her closeness to the pregnancy and his generosity and love for her. As for Ibn Sirin Seeing banknotes and coins is evidence of wealth and wealth, and also symbolizes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child being born in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child giving birth to a child in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing in a dream a pregnant woman you know or a stranger

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman you know or a stranger in a dream through the electronic vision site roy2a.com, and seeing a pregnant woman in a dream means an abundance of goodness, overcoming hardships and difficulties, the end of distress, and a big belly shows many problems and quarrels, and we will explain in this article the interpretation of a pregnant woman you know or a stranger in a dream, a man, an unmarried young man, an unmarried woman, as well as a married woman. Sadiq and other modern artists, follow us on the Roya website. Seeing a pregnant woman you know or a stranger in a dream of Imam Ibn Sirin The dream of a pregnant woman is a stranger for a single young man indicates kindness and abundance. Seeing a pregnant woman is a stranger in a dream about a pregnant woman indicates that she will be exposed to problems and difficulties during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing pregnancy in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness and many ways of life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream Seeing a pregnant woman you know or a stranger in a dream in a dream for a single woman Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for an unmarried woman means that you will hear good news and overcome difficulties. If an unmarried girl sees that she is hosting a pregnant woman in her home and sharing food with her, this indicates good luck. Seeing a pregnant woman is a stranger in a dream for a single woman indicates that there are problems and troubles that will stand in her way. See also: Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream Seeing a pregnant woman you know or a stranger in a dream of a married woman The dream of an unknown woman who was pregnant in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will become pregnant soon, if the woman is newly married. Seeing a pregnant woman is a stranger in a dream about a married woman and she was crying , almost refers to comfort and difficulty after comfort. If a married woman sees a pregnant woman and meets her in a dream, this indicates the death of anxiety and worry and the passage of difficult stages and the death of marital disputes. If a divorced woman sees a pregnant woman with a big belly in a dream, this indicates the approaching birth and the end of sadness. title: The coffin in a dream and the interpretation of seeing a dead person in the coffin

preview.html: The coffin in a dream. Through these lines, we will examine with you the interpretation of seeing a coffin in a dream and the meaning of seeing a dead person inside the coffin in a dream, especially since it is considered one of the common visions that have many connotations and interpretations. There are many people who are looking for a detailed interpretation of the meaning of the dream, and this is what we will present to you. During these lines.Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a coffinDream interpretation scholars believe that seeing a dead person in a coffin is evidence of his approaching death, while seeing a single person carrying a dead person in a dream is evidence of the lies and hypocrisy of the visionary. Some dream interpretation researchers believe that this vision It is considered good news for the dreamer that his desires will be fulfilled and that there is an abundance of sustenance and great luck coming to the individual. If the dreamer wants to travel abroad, then seeing a coffin in a dream indicates the soonest date of travel, but if he is an employee, this is evidence that he will get a job in a famous place or He is promoted and gets a higher position. But if the dreamer was a student in one of the educational levels and saw in a dream that someone was giving him a coffin full of jewels, then this is evidence of his excellence in studies. And whoever sees in a dream a coffin with a dead person in it, this is evidence of the collapse of the obstacles, disagreements and problems that he faces in his life. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a coffin with a dead person in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s need for God’s help in dealing with enemies. Seeing a coffin in a dream is married to Ibn Sirin. It is said that a married woman who sees a coffin with a dead person in her dream is evidence of the return of her estranged children and her reunion with them. He sees that he is sitting on top of the coffin in a dream, as it has shown him that there are many competitors in his life and enmity between him and one of his acquaintances, and the interpretation of the vision varies according to certain matters, such as: the size of the coffin, if its size is large, indicates blessing and goodness, and the person who dreams that he He tries to lift the coffin but is unable to carry it, evidence of debts. Interpretation of seeing a coffin with a corpse by Ibn ShaheenImam Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing a coffin in a dream and the dreamer sitting in it is evidence of success, transcendence, and the fulfillment of desires and dreams, and the vision may indicate the dreamer’s illness and harm. Whoever sees himself in The coffin while he was dead after the shroud is a sign of the approaching time of his death. As for whoever sees himself, his soul will return to him again, and his exit from the coffin is evidence of ease. One of the dreamer’s affairs after the distress he has suffered since the past period, and it may also indicate the dreamer’s happiness and the soon fulfillment of his desires and goals. Ibn Shaheen believes that if the coffin is embroidered and white in color, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s boasting about his money. The meaning of seeing a coffin with a dead person in it in one dream is said to be different. A married woman who dreams of a shroud with a dead person inside it, and the dead person is evidence that the woman thinks a lot about marriage and may indicate her psychological state, sadness and grief. The sadness that she suffers from in her life. Seeing the same girl and someone forcing her to sleep in the coffin is evidence that you are forcing this girl to marry someone she does not want to marry, but if the dreamer sees herself sleeping in the coffin,

In the event that one sees that he was running in the mountains, this may indicate the high position that he obtained On the dreamer at that time. In the case of dreaming of running in the mountains, this may indicate the desire to achieve goals and ambitions in those days. It is possible that seeing the mountain while running in a dream is an indication of the goodness and abundance that the dreamer gains during this time, and God knows best. Whoever dreams that he is running after a small child could indicate the happiness that he experienced Whoever had the vision during that period, and God knows best.
